alert.note: Alert for Camden; Northwestern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:01AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden, northwestern Burlington, southeastern Montgomery, southern Bucks, east central Chester, Philadelphia and Delaware Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 301 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morris Park, or 8 miles west of Philadelphia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Camden, Gloucester City, Bensalem, Norristown, Chester, Lansdale, West Norriton, East Norriton, Bellmawr, Yeadon, Westtown, Bristol, Perkasie, Riverside, Conshohocken, Palmyra, Hatboro, Souderton and Folcroft. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 3. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 321 and 358. Northeast Extension between mile markers 21 and 33. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 5 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 26 and 29. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
